name: Playroom Chase
description:
Flashing police lights behind your car... it's time to put the pedal to the metal...
but always remember... crime doesn't pay in the end... you have no chance to escape...
let's see how long you would be able to sustain...

Playroom Chase is a 3D all-action, fast-paced police chase driving game played with toy cars.
Your car accelerates automatically, you just have to steer it using the touch or tilt controls.
Avoid crashing into any obstacles!

FEATURES
- 4 beautiful scenes to explore
- 8 different vehicles
- Stunning 3D graphics powered by Metal on compatible devices
- Realistic physics simulation
- Easy to learn touch or tilt controls
- Game Center leaderboards
- No ads
- No In-App Purchases
